Mount them straight up for a mini ape profile or pull them back into a pullback/tiller style bar. The best of both worlds!!!

These have a narrow clamping center that will just fit in your stock 5in Harley clamps.

7in or 10in tall (Top to bottom)
8in grips (cut them down if your dont have any switches)
5in clamping center

28in wide 

raw steel, black powdercoat, or brushed 304 stainless steel

description:

Old Skool and narrow! just the way you like it!

These specs are set up for the stock rake (28 to 32deg) on most bikes. If you have something crazy, then let me know and I can adjust them for you. Also, if you are running a high mounted tank you may have clearance issues. If so, check out the Raked Riserless Rabbits or contact me for custom sizing. Email: steffan@zombieperformance.com

or 7/8's tubing with 100mm bolt center
3.5 or 100mm bolt center tapped for 1/2-13
12in tall (riser bosses to apex of bend)

15in wide

name: W.T.F. Motorcycle Handlebars
description:
Zombie Performance W.T.F. Motorcycle Handlebars

MADE IN THE USA!!!

WTF = "What the Fuck"
Which is going to be exactly what your gonna hear if you show up to a HOG rally rocking these bars on your ride.

These bars are super narrow and aggressive looking. Perfect for splitting lanes!

The Uprights come up inbetween your risers so these will require two piece riser clamps that will have a minimum of 2 3/8s inch between them. The 1in wide Biltwell Slimline risers are perfect for these bars.

1in or 7/8's steel tube
8in grips
6in, 8in, or 10in tall
7in center [uprights take up the center 2 3/8s inch]

Raw steel, or Black Powdercoat finish

both tapped for 1/2-13 threads

9in grips w/10deg drop
25deg forward bend

Raw steel or black powdercoat finish

These bars are NOT dimpled. Please add the wiring reliefs, internal wiring, or Double Time options to the cart before placing an order.

description:

description:

available in 10in, 12, and 14in tall

ALL HANDLEBARS ARE MADE TO ORDER. MY WORK LOAD VARIES SO, PLEASE ALLOW ATLEAST A COUPLE WEEKS TO GET YOUR BARS BUILT AND COATED FOR YOU. THANKS - STEFFAN ZP.

name: Stash Tubes!
description:
Zombie Performance Stash Tube Caps!

Order these along with your custom Zombie Performance Handlebars and have a safe place inside the tube of your handlebar to keep your registration or anything else you wanna cram in there!

These work perfect on any of my handlebar designs that have a horizontal lower tube like my : Quarter Racers, STFU, Legsplitters, GloryHole, WTF, or Clamp Style rabbits.

If you modify your grips these could be used as bar end caps or on the bottoms of my ClownCar Bars, Wingus, or Zombie Apes IF you have the clearance from the top of your triple tree.

*YOUR HANDLEBARS MUST BE SET UP FOR STASH TUBES TO USE THESE!!! 

**MY HANDLEBARS WITH HOROZONTAL CLAMP TUBES NORMALLY COME CAPPED OFF SO THESE WILL NOT WORK ON ANY OF THESE DESIGNS THAT WERE NOT SET UP FOR STASH TUBES.

***THERE WILL BE AN ADDITIONAL FEE TO INSTALL A STASH TUBE INTO HANDLEBARS THAT ARE NOT ALREADY SET UP WITH AN ACCESSIBLE TUBE

FITS: 1in or 7/8s .120 wall tube Handlebars

Comes with 12in of stainless steel rod to be cut to length and glued into one side for attaching your stash when ordered alone.

Stainless rod will be glued, cut to length, and fitted when ordered with Handlebars.

Knurled aluminum caps with double o-ring design for a tight and sealed fit.

PLEASE CONTACT ME FOR ANY QUESTIONS WITH HANDLEBAR FITMENT. steffan@zombieperformance.com

name: Powdercoating
description:
Powdercoating option for your custom handlebars!

Choose a custom Color for your custom Zombie Performance Handlebars!

STANDARD OPTIONS:
- MEDIUM BLACK (semi gloss): looks good on gloss or flat bikes and stays clean.
- GLOSS WHITE: looks unique and super clean without being boring!

CUSTOM OPTIONS:
-FLAT BLACK: slightly textured
-GLOSS BLACK: like a jet black paint job! and youll have to care for it like one too.
-LIME GREEN: for those of you who are couragious enough
-HOT PINK
-METAL FLAKE (list color of flake over desired base color)
-NEAR CHROME (powdercoat! shiny but not a mirror finish)
-BLACK CHROME (powdercoat! shiny but not a mirror finish)
- SINGLE STAGE COLORS: you name it and ill see if I can have it done!
- MULTISTAGE COLORS: these are shot with an extra clear coat that gives depth to your powdercoat just like a custom paint job.

Please allow up to 2 weeks for powdercoating. Medium black is the most popular and usually has the quickest turn around time. Please allow additional time for custom colors and metal flakes.
 
Please Specify in the notes what color options you want if you want a custom color.

$30 for Blacks, whites, and othe single stage colors
$50 for Custom Colors , multistage, and flakes.
*Some custom color options may cost more.

If you have any questions please email me: steffan@zombieperformance.com

name: Wiring Reliefs (dimples)
description:
These are Reliefs that I cut into the grips so that you have clearance for the wiring on your switch housings can exit your control assemblys.

I use heavy wall tubing so I cannot just "dimple" the bars like the shitty thinwall factory bars.

Reliefs are cut 1/2in wide and run from 7in to 8.5in from the end of the grips.

If you need different spacing please make a note when makeing your order during the checkout.

NOTE: adding reliefs may change the width dimensions on some bars due to the added length needed for your controls. Please measure your controls and make sure everything is correct.

name: Internal Wiring
description:
Internal wiring option for Zombie Performance Handlebars

This option allows you to run your stock electrical wiring through the handlebars for a cleaner look.

I cut 1in long by 1/2in wide slots in the grips from 5.5in to 6.5in from the ends of the bars grip and a 1in x 1/2in inlet at the center of the clamp tube or at the bottom of the uprights on riserless bars.

All slots and weld joints will be cleaned and deburred.

Running the wiring through the bars is your responsibility and may be a real chore or not recommended depending on the handlebar you choose.  Any handlebars that have any sharp corners or hard joints will be a pain to run your wiring through and be a risk for electrical shorts.

I am not responsible for any damage to the wiring or damage due to the electrical system if a short occurs.

I do not recomend this option for any of my handlebars but im an willing to set your bars up for internal wiring if you so choose.

If you have any questions or conserns please contact me via email: steffan@zombieperformance.com

name: Knurling
description:
Add this to your cart to have your custom bars Knurled!

Normal knurling is 1in wide (for each clamp) and for 3.5in center to center clamps.

If you need different spacing just leave a comment in the notes when checking out.

Note: Powdercoating the knurled sections may cover up the knurling a little bit. On steel bars; non powdercoated knurls will rust.

name: Double Time Mod!
description:
Make your custom riserless handlebars even cooler by adding a second cross support. DOUBLE TIME!!!

TO ORDER: add the desired riserless handlebars to the cart and then add The Double Time Mod to the cart with the bars to make a total package.

*Double Time Mod is only available on Riserless Handlebars that are 8in or taller such as:

Riserless Rabbits
Raked Riserless Rabbits
Traditional Riserless Rabbits
Riserless Zeez
Wicked Riserless Zeez
Riserless Squid Bars
Mooseknuckle Bars
T-bags and T-bars
Wizard Sleeves

**Cross support tube style will be matched to the style of the handlebar chosen.

THIS IS A CUSTOM MOD AND WILL REQUIRE THE HANDLEBARS BE MADE TO ORDER.

name: Weld-In Sportster EFI Plate
description:
THE ORIGINAL!!
Zombie Performance Weld-In Sportster EFI Plate

100% HAND MADE IN THE USA!!!

Weld this plate into a custom fuel tank and keep your stock electronic fuel injection. 

10GA steel. NOT some stamped foreign sheet metal part.

measures 2.750 x 6.125

For use with Sportster fuel pumps ONLY.

$50 shipped to the continental USA.
add $25 for international orders.

name: Struts!
description:
Zombie Performance Stainless Steel Struts!

MADE IN THE USA!!!

Bolt these on to make your swingarm bike a Hardtail!

10in center to center
drilled for 1/2in hardware
1.25 diameter x 2in long bosses
1.25 tubing sleeved down to 1in .120wall tubing
TIG welded brushed 304 stainless steel, black powdercoated or raw steel.

*does not come with hardware

name: Riserless Handlebar Spacers
description:
Zombie Performance Riserless handlebar spacers.

Are your riserless handlebars too low?

Do your grips hit the new gas tank you just put on?

BOOM!!! Heres your fix!

These spacers mount underneath the threaded mounts of your riserless handlebars to raise the whole handlebar up from your triple trees.

1.25 diameter cold rolled steel spacers
Reamed 1/2in diameter center hole
1in, 1.5, and 2in tall
Raw steel, Black powdercoat finish, or stainless steel

* These will require longer mounting bolts and are NOT supplied with the spacers.

**need these in custom specs? Email me: steffan@zombieperformance.com

name: Biltwell Black Slimline Risers
description:
These polished stainless steel risers are the perfect addition to my clamp style handlebars. Slim enough for my handlebars that have the uprights that come up between the risers and strong enough for the rest!
 
Solid, investment-cast and polished stainless steel with stainless clamp hardware. Super heavy duty and built to last. These risers provide a 1.75" rise. For 1" handlebars only.
 
If your running 7/8's bars pick up some Handlebar shims!

name: Biltwell Polished Slimline Risers
description:
These polished stainless steel risers are the perfect addition to my clamp style handlebars. Slim enough for my handlebars that have the uprights that come up between the risers and strong enough for the rest!

Solid, investment-cast and polished stainless steel with stainless clamp hardware. Super heavy duty and built to last. These risers provide a 1.75" rise. For 1" handlebars only. 

If your running 7/8's bars pick up some Handlebar shims!

name: Black 1in Biltwell Whiskey Throttle
description:
The Biltwell Whiskey Throttle assembly is my favorite throttle on the market today. Its smooth, reliable, and clean looking!

The Biltwell Whiskey throttle is constructed of CNC-machined 6061 T-6 aluminum and fits all 1-inch O.D. handlebars. Four different cable ferrules are included with each full assembly. These plated steel ferrules fit both threaded and click-in barrel ends on stock Harley cables. If you don’t run stock H-D cables on your motorcycle, our ferrules provide plenty of options for custom single cable assembly. Like most Biltwell products, the Whiskey throttle should be installed by competent home mechanics or experienced professionals.

name: Polished 1in Biltwell Whiskey Throttle
description:
The Biltwell Whiskey Throttle assembly is my favorite throttle on the market today. Its smooth, reliable, and clean looking!


The Biltwell Whiskey throttle is constructed of CNC-machined 6061 T-6 aluminum and fits all 1-inch O.D. handlebars. Four different cable ferrules are included with each full assembly. These plated steel ferrules fit both threaded and click-in barrel ends on stock Harley cables. If you don’t run stock H-D cables on your motorcycle, our ferrules provide plenty of options for custom single cable assembly. Like most Biltwell products, the Whiskey throttle should be installed by competent home mechanics or experienced professionals.
